title: [Warrior Guild, South Hall]
description: The series of vertical slits in the thick stone wall emits beams of sunlight, transforming the hall into a pattern of dark and light -- as well as providing access for defense against any invaders.  Ancient weapons and crests hang along the inner stone wall, their polished surfaces reflecting glimmers of light.
